scripts.generateSwaggerApis: bash -c "rm -rf src/generated/registry && java -jar ../tools/swagger-codegen-cli.jar generate -l typescript-node -i http://localhost:6100/api/0.1/api-docs/swagger.json -o src/generated/registry --type-mappings Aspect=any,JsonPatch=any --import-mappings Aspect=none,JsonPatch=none,Operation=none -DsupportsES6=true"
